content: colorful stripes of adorable hearts are set against a solid background of exquisite softness in this cuddly crochet blanket featuring our silky soft bernat baby velvet and bernat crushed velvet yarns each row is stitched in a single color ensuring that you don t have to carry more than one strand at a time you ll love seeing the little bobble hearts spring to life as you work your background color into the row below create a unique version or replicate one of the delightful colorways shown
